
                            
                            <p>工行APP搜“工银瑞信”，找场景号进去，横幅里找到，看图片，答案选A(兼具股债双重属性)。<img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/17/160604b6pr34evve8dppz8.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/17/160604b6pr34evve8dppz8.png"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/17/160844zyzg8kox66qwqo8n.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/17/160844zyzg8kox66qwqo8n.jpg"> </p>
